message.content:
cs.CV, cs.GR, cs.RO, cs.MM, cs.HC 

The paper deals with the problem of estimating 3D hand pose and shape from single RGB images, which is a computer vision problem (cs.CV). The paper also introduces a new dataset for this task, which involves capturing hand poses and shapes in real-world scenarios, which could fall under graphics (cs.GR) or robotics (cs.RO). The paper also proposes a semi-automated approach for annotating the dataset, which could involve machine learning (cs.MM) or human-computer interaction (cs.HC).
